Note.Content: RSV NRSV NJB "his heart died" | NIV "his heart failed" | REB "he had a seizure" CEV "he had a heart attack" GNT "he suffered a stroke" [1a] | NJPS "courage died" [1b]
This is a so-called atbash cipher, by which the aleph is encoded as a taw, the beth as a sin/shin, the gimel as a resh, etc.
RV60 RVR95 "desmayó su corazón" RVA "amorteció su corazón | BLP "le falló el corazón" | NTV "tuvo un derrame cerebral" NVI CST "un ataque al corazón" [1a]
Esto es lo que se conoce como "cifrado de atbashr", en el que la alef es realmente tav, la bet es shin/sin, la guimel es resh, etc.

LEXSense.DefinitionShort: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= partie du corps humain

= órgão localizado no centro do corpo humano que bombeia o sangue através de nosso sistema circulatório, ≈ visto como o lugar do conhecimento, do raciocínio, planejamento, inteligência, habilidade, afeto e ódio, desejo e satisfação, humildade e orgulho, coragem e temor, alegria e tristeza dos seres humanos

= órgano localizado en el centro del cuerpo humano que bombea sangre a través del sistema circulatorio, ≈ visto como el centro del conocimiento, el razonamiento humano, planes, inteligencia, habilidades, afecto y odio, deseo y satisfacción, humildad y orgullo, valor y miedo, gozo y tristeza

＝最大的貓科動物，雌性，從鼻子至尾巴尖的長度往往約有 2.8 米，站立時肩膀高度可達 1 米 （3 呎 3 吋）；淺黃褐色；成年雄性的頸和肩膀長出鬃毛，顏色比其他部位的毛更深；◄拉丁語學名：Panthera leo；►不潔淨的動物；≈與侵略、無畏無懼和尊重關聯

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression, fearlessness, and respect

= le plus grand des félins, mesurant souvent 2,8 m du museau au bout de la queue, 1 mètre au garrot en station debout ; de couleur sable ocre, les mâles portent une crinière autour du cou et sur les épaules plus sombre que le reste de leur pelage ; ◄ |iPanthera leo|i* ; ► animal impur ; ≈ associé à l’agressivité et à la force

= el más grande de los felinos, mide unos 2.8 metros desde su nariz a su cola, y alrededor de 1 metro (3 pies 3 pulgadas) hasta sus lomos; de un color amarillento a marrón pálido; alrededor del cuello y del lomo de los adultos machos crece un pelaje que es más oscuro que el resto de su cuerpo; ◄ Panthera leo; ► animal impuro; ≈ asociado con agresión, valor y respeto

= o maior dos grandes felinos, frequentemente medindo cerca de 2,80 metros do nariz à ponta da cauda, com altura que chega a um metro (3 pés e 3 polegadas) nos ombros; de cor marrom amarelada clara; em redor da nuca e ombros dos machos adultos cresce uma juba de coloração mais escura que o restante da sua pelagem; ◄ Panthera leo ► animal impuro; ≈ associado a agressão, destemor, e respeito
＝最大的貓科動物，由鼻子至尾巴尖的長度往往約有 2.8 米，站立時肩膀高度可達 1 米 （3 呎 3 吋）；淺黃褐色；成年雄性的頸和肩膀長出鬃毛，顏色比其他部位的毛更深；◄拉丁語學名：Panthera leo；►不潔淨的動物；≈與侵略、無畏無懼和尊重關聯
＝最大的猫科动物，由鼻子至尾巴尖的长度往往约有 2.8 米，站立时肩膀高度可达 1 米 （3 英尺 3 英寸）；浅黄褐色；成年雄性的颈和肩膀长出鬃毛，颜色比其他部位的毛更深；◄拉丁语学名：Panthera leo；►不洁净的动物；≈与侵略、无畏无惧和尊重关联

Glosses.Gloss: intention of the speaker makes addressee to perform what the speecch act points out so that the intended result may be brought out. Speech act is performed so that the actor of the matrix perform what the agent of the speech act in order to achieve the intended or hoped goal. in this case (when the matrix is speech act), the intended goal of the agent of the matrix is tha saem as the intended goal of the agent of the speech act.

but the intentions of the speker who is outside the purpose construction (MC and PC). this case may be a starting point of the use of narrative comment.

Lemaan + inf with suff is utilized instead of lemaan + yiqtol because no subject change occurs. However, lemaan + yiqtol תְּסַפֵּר וּלְמַעַן is employed because of subject change between the matrix and lemaan clause.

Glosses.Gloss: The meaning of סְפֹות הָרָוָה אֶת־הַצְּמֵאָה is not certain. Craigie (1976:359) claims this phrase to be an ancient idiom saying that "although the particular sense of the sying is no longer clear, the general implication seems clear enough: no one would escape judgment." Tigay (1996:280) regards the phrases as a lost idiom claiming that this phrases is Moses' comment. (Craigie, P C 1976. The Book of Deuteronomy (The New International Commentary on the Old Testament). Grand Rapids, Mich: William B Eerdmans Publishing Company./ Tigay, J H 1996. The JPS Torah Commentary. Deuteronomy. Philadelphia/ Jerusalem: The Jewish Publication Society.)
